data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Qiu, Jian-Yue, Xu, Hao, Chen, Li (2019): Coloration variability of the Oriental genus Agnorimus Miyake & Iwase, 1991 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae, Cetoniinae) with synonymic notes. Zootaxa 4585 (3): 531-545, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4585.3.8|106 occurrences
